casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kyle Edward MORTON. No. 536P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 3, 2005. Irving Joyner, Durham, for Kyle Edward Morton. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of September 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of October 2005."
